name: Samurai Warriors 2 Empires
description: The Games on Demand version supports English. Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual". Feudal Japan is yours to conquer in SAMURAI WARRIORS 2 Empires! Become a samurai warlord and lead your clan into battle against enemy states! Plan every move you make to expand your territory, and when it comes time to fight, give direct orders to guide your army's advance. In between the action, train your officers, select battlefield tactics, and enact domestic policies that earn the praise - or malice - of your people.
